## Stack for Apache Hadoop (+ versions)

* HDFS - 3.1.3
* YARN - 3.1.3
* MapReduce - 3.1.3
* Tez - 0.9.1
* Hive - 3.1.2
* Sqoop - 1.4.7
* Oozie - 5.2.0
* ZooKeeper - 3.7.0
* Spark - 3.2.1
* HttpFS - 3.1.3
* Hue - 4.10.0
* Kerberos - 1.10.3-30
* Solr - 8.8.1
